scripts.premigration: npm run clean && npm run build:orm
scripts.migration:apply: npm run premigration && cross-env NODE_ENV=migration npm run typeorm migration:run -- -d dist/DataSource.js
scripts.migration:create: npm run premigration && cross-env NODE_ENV=migration npm run typeorm migration:generate -- -d dist/DataSource.js
scripts.migration:revert: npm run premigration && cross-env NODE_ENV=migration npm run migration:revert -- -d dist/DataSource.js
